articles.title: Union Ministers Mukhtar Abbas Naqvi, R C P Singh resign from PM Modi cabinet
articles.description: The move comes as the ministers' tenure in the Rajya Sabha ends on July 7. With Naqvi's resignation, the BJP will have no Muslim representation in the Narendra Modi government.
